scripts.dev: mkdir -p ./DEV-DATA/zinc && chmod a+rwx ./DEV-DATA/zinc && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d dev-db dev-zinc
scripts.test:backend: mkdir -p ./TEST-DATA/zinc && chmod a+rwx ./TEST-DATA/zinc && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --abort-on-container-exit --build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml rm -fsv
